name: OCTOPTICOM
description: OCTOPTICOM is an open-ended puzzle programming game about designing and optimizing optical computing devices. Use lasers, mirrors, filters and other components to read, transform and write sequences of colored squares.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: 2.0 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Storage: 100 MB available space
